task.title: Scheduling Payments
task.shortdesc: Scheduled payments for cash entries and invoices need a form of ePayment.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Sales Orders tab in the eBusiness app and click New.
Select the Posting Entity and the Schedule Type.
Enter values for the Scheduled Frequency, Number of Installments, and Schedule Start Date.
step.info: To complete a purchase, click the New Sales Order Line button on the Sales Order Lines related list. Select the Item using the lookup and click Save.
The Price Override option is enabled by default. If applicable, manually enter a new price to the Sale Price field.

step.cmd: Use the lookup to identify the Payment Gateway.
Select Closed and Posted for the Status and Posting Status fields. Click Save.

taskbody.result: The related lists will update to reflect the accounting impact of payments for cash entries and invoices.
